title: Baby Shark
short_plot_summary: The song tells the story of a family of sharks, singing and dancing along to a catchy tune.
explanation: A baby, symbolizing Baby Shark, the central character of the song
A shark, representing the main subject of the song: Baby Shark and its family
A woman, illustrating Mommy Shark as part of the song
A grandmother, symbolizing Grandma Shark as part of the song
A grandfather, depicting Grandpa Shark as part of the song
